channel.title: If you BMX this is the thread for you
channel.description: Hello, I just got a new bike a day ago. I'll post a picture of it later today. But I'm just wondering how many BMXers are their on mopar? If you're one post a comment, and try to also post a picture of your bike.

item.title: If you BMX this is the thread for you
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:26, topic:346674”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=443053.msg3253894#msg3253894 date=1277959891]

krack i can honestly see u riding that with ur piggy tails hahahhaha

Lol I have rode a Barbie bike before…with a pony tail

Wow kracky I just lost all respect as a man turds you.
[/quote]
lol I will do it again and record for everyone, with a sign in my ass saying “I <3 Moody”[/quote]

You should and then hax Natey cooking pure so I can has it. <3

Read full topic

'nuff said[/quote]
Woahhh, I use to have like, the SAME bike as that, lmfao.
I sold it though. Different seat, different grips, and different pedals though. They were orange.
anyawy, here’s mine: It’s BRIGHT purple, but it doesn’t like, show it.

But it has RED grips, peddles, rims, and it has a odyssey seat.
